name: 王正豪
objective: 本課程之設計，在介紹資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。課程內容包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
schedule:
0. Introduction: Ch.1 (1 wk)
1. Symmetric ciphers: Ch.3-8 (4 wks)
- Classical encryption techniques and the Data Encryption Standard
- Block ciphers
- Advanced Encryption Standard
- Block cipher operation
- Random bit generation and stream ciphers
2. Asymmetric ciphers: Ch. 9-10 (2 wks)
- Public-key cryptography and RSA
- Other public-key cryptosystems
3. Cryptographic data integrity algorithms: Ch. 11- 13 (2 wks)
- Cryptographic hash functions
- Message authentication codes
- Digital signatures
4. Midterm Exam (1 wk)
5. Mutual trust: Ch. 14-15 (2 wks)
- Key management and distribution
- User authentication
6. Network and internet security: Ch. 16-20 (3 wks)
- Network access control and cloud security
- Transport-level security
- Wireless network security
- Electronic mail security
- IP security
7. Term project presentation (3 wks)
scorePolicy:
Written homeworks: ~30%
Midterm exam and quiz: ~35%
Term project: ~35%
materials:

. http://williamstallings.com/NetworkSecurity/ 

. Some slides and papers
